title: Built-In Leads Manager
description: Don’t have a CRM? Start conversations and track all of your lead information in one place for an effective close

title: Real-Time Lead Synchronization
description: Close the time gap and have your targeted leads automatically transfer to over 25+ CRMs and email service providers of choice as soon as they enter your sales funnel.

title: Personal Assistant - LeadsBot
description: Need an assistant to keep track of your account activities? The LeadsBot reminds you of negative balance, duplicate leads, and more.

title: Automated Lead Distribution
description: Allocate leads evenly among your sales team or assign more leads to your best salesperson to increase sales opportunities.

title: Team Accounts
description: Have your entire sales team on LeadsTunnel to manage more volume of qualified leads and close more sales!

title: Template Manager
description: Easily create and manage your email and SMS messages to eliminate low-value, repetitive tasks from your day!

title: Automatic Lead Scoring
description: Know exactly who your hottest leads are to prioritize your follow-up strategy and maximize your time for value-adding results.

title: Segment By Lead Tagging
description: Organize and segment your leads by tags so you know the status of each lead or whichever way you want to identify them for increased efficiency.

title: Instant Lead Notifications
description: Get alerted through email and SMS the moment you receive a new lead to cut down the lead response time and increase your closing rate!

title: Automated Messages
description: Be the first to engage your qualified leads with an automatic email and SMS the moment they come in contact with you even when your business is offline.

title: In-App Messaging
description: Create conversations with your leads directly within LeadsTunnel via our in-app email and SMS messaging! Have the whole conversation logged to assist closing or use it for sales training.

title: Lead Export
description: Whether you want to do segmentation or add leads to another platform, simply export your leads by date, campaign, lead score and so much more in a user-friendly .csv file.

title: Facebook Integration
description: Target your prospects where they are! Use Facebook Lead Ad to collect large volumes of targeted leads natively on the platform for cost-effective results!

title: Google Integration
description: Got an offer for people who are hungry for them? Use Google Lead Ad to target hyperactive buyers and generate highly-qualified leads for increased sales!

title: Web Form Integration
description: Landing pages are still an effective way of generating leads. Embed a web form on any page you want and automate the entire process!

title: Widget Web Form
description: Don’t forget your website can be a lead generator! Embed a widget form on your website to promote an offer and get your visitors’ contact information.

title: Multi-Channel Integration
description: With over 25+ integrations of the most popular CRMs and email service providers, you can transfer your leads to multiple touchpoints to further indoctrinate your leads for close.
